data.name: The Hidden Room - Donation #1
data.detailed_description:
This DLC doesn't give you any content in-game, but it's just a small donation for us (2 student guys that have always had the passion of gaming and programming at the same time) that will be used to improve and develop new content for current and upcoming games :)

Thanks!
